ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | sbrim.1 | |- ( ph -> A. x ph ) |
| 2 |  | #P_sbim | |- ( [ y / x ] ( ph -> ps ) <-> ( [ y / x ] ph -> [ y / x ] ps ) ) |
| 3 | 1 | #P_sbh | |- ( [ y / x ] ph <-> ph ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_imbi1i | |- ( ( [ y / x ] ph -> [ y / x ] ps ) <-> ( ph -> [ y / x ] ps ) ) |
| 5 | 2, 4 | #P_bitri | |- ( [ y / x ] ( ph -> ps ) <-> ( ph -> [ y / x ] ps ) ) |
\
 Substitution with a variable not free in antecedent affects only the consequent.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)
